para.text: Beginning January 1, 2025, a retailer shall not discriminate against cash as a form of payment for goods or services, including by:
Refusing to accept cash as a form of payment;
Posting signs on the premises that cash payment is not accepted; or
Charging a higher price to consumers who pay cash.
